subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Outfielder Andre Ethier has agreed to a two-year, $15.25 million contract with the Los Angeles Dodgers. He will receive a $500,000 signing bonus and salaries of $5.5 million this year and $9.25 million in 2011. He batted .272 with 31 homers and 106 runs batted in last season.
